p: The average GCase activity level of the two patients with PD carrying heterozygous GBA variants (142±21 nmol/h/mg protein) was 34% lower compared with the healthy controls (201±36 nmol/h/mg protein) and the difference was significant (P<0.05), whereas the patients carrying heterozygous PARK2 variants had a mean activity (204±50 nmol/h/mg protein) close to the mean value of the healthy controls ( Table I).
